title: 7.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Create an Excel file with three columns as shown below. In the first and second columns, add the First name and Last name. To fill the column named Full name, use the CONCATENATE function to merge the First name and Last name.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
